objects.name: Player
objects.description: Represents a player in the Tank War game mode. Players earn gold and spend it on stat upgrades.
objects.special_rules: Players can upgrade stats (HP, Speed, FireRate, Damage) up to Level 10. Limited to 12‒18 total upgrades per match.
objects.source_note: Derived from upgrade mechanics and sanity check calculations.

objects.name: Tower
objects.description: A destructible objective that provides gold rewards when destroyed.
objects.special_rules: When destroyed by ATK, grants +40 gold per player. When destroyed by DEF, grants +10% GpS for 15 seconds.

systems.name: Gold Economy System
systems.description: Manages gold generation and distribution for players during a match.
systems.mechanics: Gold is earned through Gold-per-Second (GpS), Kill Gold, and Objective Gold. Players spend gold on stat upgrades.
systems.objectives: Balance ATK/DEF dynamics, prevent snowballing, and encourage strategic decision-making.
interactions: Players earn GpS based on time and rubber-band mechanics.
Players earn Kill Gold for defeating enemies.
Players earn Objective Gold for destroying towers.
systems.source_note: Derived from Gold Sources and Upgrade Cost sections.

systems.name: Upgrade System
systems.description: Allows players to enhance their stats using earned gold.
systems.mechanics: Each stat has 10 levels with exponentially increasing costs. Players can only afford 12‒18 upgrades per match.
systems.objectives: Encourage strategic choices and prevent all-max builds.
interactions: Players allocate gold to upgrade HP, Speed, FireRate, or Damage.
Higher-level upgrades become progressively more expensive.
systems.source_note: Derived from Upgrade Cost and Rule sections.

logic_rules.description: Determines the amount of gold generated per second for each player.
logic_rules.effect: Gold is added to the player's total based on G_base, ramp multiplier, and rubber-band multiplier.
logic_rules.source_note: Derived from GpS formula and rubber-band mechanics.

logic_rules.description: Rewards players with gold for defeating enemy players.
logic_rules.trigger: When a player kills an enemy.
logic_rules.effect: The killer receives +80 gold. If the team reaches 20 kills, the match ends.

logic_rules.description: Defines the effects of destroying a tower for both ATK and DEF teams.
logic_rules.effect: ATK players receive +40 gold each. DEF players gain +10% GpS for 15 seconds.

requirements.title: Balanced Gold Distribution
requirements.description: Ensure neither ATK nor DEF gains an overwhelming gold advantage.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players should have enough gold to purchase 12‒18 upgrades per match but not max all stats.
requirements.source_note: Derived from Mục tiêu thiết kế section.

requirements.title: Prevent Snowballing
requirements.description: Implement rubber-band mechanics to reduce snowball effects.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Trailing teams should receive a GpS boost when behind in Kill/Death ratio.

requirements.title: Strategic Upgrade Choices
requirements.description: Force players to prioritize specific stat upgrades due to limited resources.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players cannot afford to max all stats within a single match.
requirements.source_note: Derived from Chi phí nâng cấp section.
